attributes.action: Ban MPs from using mobile phones whilst in the chamber of the House of Commons.
attributes.additional_details: It is not compatible with concentrating or listening to important debates and issues, and is fundamentally rude and disrespectful behaviour.
attributes.background: Ban the use of mobile phones in the House of Commons chamber whilst in session.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament as a whole aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Order in the Commons is the responsibility of the Speaker personally.
